texts.name: Sixiasil
texts.biography: Krigans love experiments. In Sixiasil combined two incompatible magical powers - earth and air. Surprisingly, she survived, although she complains that she is sometimes torn apart. In addition, Sixiasil has gained the ability to suck magic out of anything - she needs a regular influx of mana so that the forces do not break her.
